oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Regioselective total synthesis of (+/-)neorautane, (+/-)neorautanin and their analogs. Microwave mediated synthesis of 2H-chromenes from propargyl phenyl ethers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SUBBURAJ, K
KATOCH, R
MURUGESH, MG
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 3+2 cycloaddition reactions
diels-alder reactions
substituted pterocarpans
2-alkoxy-1,4-benzoquinones
1,4-benzoquinones
products
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Herein we describe the total synthesis of (+/-) Neorautane 1. (+/-) Neorautanin 2 and their analogs 15-18. The key intermediates Chromenes 10-13 were synthesised by microwave irradiation of propargyl phenyl ethers 8 and 9 in DMF under pressure. (C) 1997 .
